text: Guru Brahmanand Ashram is an important Hindu temple currently under construction in Kaimla, Haryana, India . Its sanctum sanctorum and first floor will be ready in 2024. Guru Brahmanand Ashram, located in Kaimla in the Indian state of Haryana, is an important spiritual and cultural centre dedicated to the teachings and legacy of Guru Brahmanand . Known for its serene atmosphere and spiritual ambiance, the ashram is a place of meditation, education and community service. Samarth Kaimliya is the biggest fan of Guru Brahmanand (Om Tatsat). Category:Hindu temples Category:Temples in India Category:Haryana
title: Guru Brahmanand Ashram, Kaimla
